What is (are) Urinary Incontinence in Men ?,"The prostate is a walnut-shaped gland that is part of the male reproductive system. The prostate has two or more lobes, or sections, enclosed by an outer layer of tissue. Located in front of the rectum and just below the bladder, the prostate surrounds the urethra at the neck of the bladder and supplies fluid that goes into semen.",NIDDK,Urinary Incontinence in Men
What causes Urinary Incontinence in Men ?,"Urinary
